getInfrastructureID

public PeerGroupID getInfrastructureID()
Returns the infrastructure ID configuration or null if none is available.

By Setting an alternate infrastructure PeerGroup ID (from NetPeerGroup), it prevents heterogeneous infrastructure PeerGroups from intersecting.

This is highly recommended practice for application deployment

Returns:
Infrastructure ID or null if none available.

addSeedRelay

public void addSeedRelay(URI seedURI,
                         int itemNumber)
Adds RelayService peer seed address using item numbers. If the seedURI parameter is null or if the item number is negative, the corresponding seed URI item is removed. Different item numbers allows the configuration of several relay seed URIs.

A RelayService seed is defined as a physical endpoint address

e.g. http://192.168.1.1:9700, or tcp://192.168.1.1:9701

Parameters:
seedURI - the relay seed URI
itemNumber - seed URI item number

getSeedRelay

public URI getSeedRelay(int itemNumber)
Return the relay seed URI corresponding to the item number or null if none is available.

Parameters:
itemNumber - the URI item number
Returns:
a relay seed URI or null

getAllSeedRelays

public Map<Integer,URI> getAllSeedRelays()
Provides the complete set of registered seed relays in a map, where the key are the item numbers.

Returns:
Map of item number and corresponding seed relay URI.

clearSeedRelays

public void clearSeedRelays()
Clears the list of RendezVousService seeds

addSeedRendezvous

public void addSeedRendezvous(URI seedURI,
                              int itemNumber)
Adds RendezvousService peer seed address using item numbers. If the seedURI parameter is null or if the item number is negative, the corresponding seed URI item is removed. Different item numbers allows the configuration of several relay seed URIs.

A RendezVousService seed is defined as a physical endpoint address

e.g. http://192.168.1.1:9700, or tcp://192.168.1.1:9701

Parameters:
seedURI - the relay seed URI
itemNumber - seed URI item number

getSeedRendezvous

public URI getSeedRendezvous(int itemNumber)
Return the rendezvous seed URI corresponding to the item number or null if none is available.

Parameters:
itemNumber - the URI item number
Returns:
a rendezvous seed URI or null

getAllSeedRendezvous

public Map<Integer,URI> getAllSeedRendezvous()
Provides the complete set of registered seed rendezvous in a map, where the key are the item numbers.

Returns:
Map of item number and corresponding seed relay URI.

clearSeedRendezvous

public void clearSeedRendezvous()
Clears the list of RendezVousService seeds

addSeedingRelay

public void addSeedingRelay(URI seedURI,
                            int itemNumber)
Adds RelayService seeding using item numbers. The URI should point to a resource containing peer seed addresses. If the seedURI parameter is null or if the item number is negative, the corresponding URI item is removed. Different item numbers allows the configuration of several relay seeding URIs.

http://rdv.jxtahosts.net/cgi-bin/relays.cgi?3

Parameters:
seedURI - the relay seed URI
itemNumber - seed URI item number

getSeedingRelay

public URI getSeedingRelay(int itemNumber)
Return the relay seeding URI corresponding to the item number or null if none is available.

Parameters:
itemNumber - the URI item number
Returns:
a relay seeding URI or null

getAllSeedingRelays

public Map<Integer,URI> getAllSeedingRelays()
Provides the complete set of registered seeding relays in a map, where the keys are the item numbers.

Returns:
Map of item number and corresponding seeding relay URI.

clearSeedingRelays

public void clearSeedingRelays()
Clears the list of RelayService seeds

addSeedingRendezvous

public void addSeedingRendezvous(URI seedURI,
                                 int itemNumber)
Adds RendezvousService seeding using item numbers. The URI should point to a resource containing peer seed addresses. If the seedURI parameter is null or if the item number is negative, the corresponding URI item is removed. Different item numbers allows the configuration of several relay seeding URIs.

http://rdv.jxtahosts.net/cgi-bin/rendezvous.cgi?3

Parameters:
seedURI - the rendezvous seed URI
itemNumber - seed URI item number

getSeedingRendezvous

public URI getSeedingRendezvous(int itemNumber)

Parameters:
itemNumber - the URI item number
Returns:
a rendezvous seeding URI or null

Map of item number and corresponding seeding relay URI.
